author: Mariam Khan
title: House lawmakers scramble back to Washington to vote on $484B relief bill
description: As the coronavirus public health crisis wears on, lawmakers are scrambling back to the nation’s capital for a Thursday vote on the $484 billion relief package.
content: As the coronavirus public health crisis wears on, lawmakers scrambled back to the nations capital for a House vote Thursday on the $484 billion relief package that will boost the exhausted small business loan program even as the city of Washington remains und… [+4741 chars]
